name: Tape-12
description:
|-|ABOUT THE GAME|-|

A simple short game of survival-horror inspired in classics ones like "Slender: The Eight Pages" where you have to find "X" quantity of items to win. It's also a game with a retro/PSX style, with low resolution textures and low-poly models.

|-|STORY|-|

A VHS tape is found. It says Tape-12, and it contains all the expeditions to the "Sublevel12". In each expedition, you are a technician sent to restore the electricity, that by some reason has ben cut off. In wich one of the expeditions is the one were you will survive?

|-|CONTROLS|-|

·L-Shift -> Run

·E-> Interact with items

·P-> Pause the tape

·Q-> Use minimap
